description: PRTG Desktop is an alternative interface that you can use to connect to a PRTG core server or a PRTG hosted by Paessler instance to configure your setup, view monitoring results, and keep an eye on your network.
summary: PRTG Desktop is an alternative interface that you can use to connect to a PRTG core server or a PRTG hosted by Paessler instance to configure your setup, view monitoring results, and keep an eye on your network.
author: Paessler AG
